title: Authoritarian regimes restrict rights and freedoms

content.question: Which of the following are most closely associated with authoritarian regimes?

choices.label: Regular and open elections for public offices
Diverse groups of political elites exercising power
Restrictions placed on civil rights and personal freedoms

content.answer: Restrictions placed on civil rights and personal freedoms

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
